reviewText: i always knew that louie giglio's talks were good, but having chinese subtitles - what a nice surprise! but they only had it for the first 2 videos..if they had it for all 4, that'd leave me completely breathless. but still, i wasn't even expecting there to be any subs, let alone chinese. oh, i'm only ranting about the subs cuz these were bought as gifts.

A 'GOTTA see' movie. The set is additional proofs of His Magnificence

Something 'grabbing' w/o Hollywood gore;
just Truth
...
I had this set once before, but it had a couple of different talks that were a little better. Over all though, the "How Great Is Our God" talk is worth the set.

Arrived promptly in appropriate packaging. Was exactly what I was looking for. Description in listing was 100% accurate. I just love the messages and photography used during the presentations. God is awesome and this man is able to convey that to all that watch.
I would recommend this DVD to everyone!!  It is totally off the charts inspirational and fascinating!  And you get 4 of them!
As advertised
Amazing!! Christian or not, a must see
Brings added insight to how amazing and awesome our God is!!!
I have purchased at least 10 sets of this DVD and given them away.  It is the best.
very well done!
purchased for my bookkeeper who will demonstrate to his children that the Bible is correct about some physical facts re the universe and the earth.
Watching this with our small group, amazed each week. We all love it. So handy to have all 4 in 1 case.
This is really worth getting. Truthful, beautiful and inspiring!
This will blow you away to hear the greatness of God shown in the heavens

This is the 3rd set of this series I have purchased.  We have used this to do small group studies, truck stop ministries, and simply to hear over and over again and still learn something every time.  Even though this is somewhat dated now, the content is as relevant as ever and this series is destined, in my opinion, to be a classic for many years to come.
Love it. Great movie  series for any family to have, and watch.

This series should be required viewing for everyone who claims to be a Christian. For those who deny the existence of the creator of this universe, this collection should be all the proof necessary to alter that opinion. If you haven't seen this, do yourself the biggest and best favor of a lifetime...rush to get them!!!!
This is excellent for all ages, believers and science lovers alike.
Highly recommend
Great videos of God's creation, with music and excellent speaker who keeps you interested.
As expected and on time.  Would recommend for any Christian library.

This product works. It does what it says, arrived in good condition and able to use it for my purpose.  I love the glories of creation and the Creator Jesus Christ. This was a gift so I can not review all 4 dvds
Great video, good price, fast shipping.
These are "must see's" for the Christian and non-Christian as well!
Simply amazing!
Excellent series . LOVE IT!~
I love this!  Wish every school kid in our nation got to watch it.  Giglio is an excellent speaker (preacher).  May God bless his efforts.  MBC
I will buy it again for a Christmas present for my Daughter & Family
We love Louie's teachings and so do our clients.
Good
This is a fantastic series.  It really makes you think about the size of the universe and our place in it as well as how awesome God is.
A must watch with some good apologetics.
This is such and amazing series and Louie Giglio is such a great speaker. Also a great deal for the price.
Awesome!
Awesome series!!
Fantastic DVD by an excellen motivational Christian speaker

We have used this with small groups, individuals who want to understand a relationship with the God of the Bible who are not yet believers, and to enhance the worship of believers. We keep giving the dvd's away and ordering them to keep for ourselves. Louie's faith and presentation of our creator God are infectious.
Bought for a gift for a friend going through a hard time. I really enjoyed it myself and helped him to focus on the greatness of our God.
These talks bring out the awesome power of God and His creation. I truly enjoyed it.
It was a magnificent video.
Excellent, I Loved It.
Those talks with Louie Giglio are a great gift to any person.
Excellent.
Great!
Beautifully done! Very interesting and informative!
You must stand in Awe of God as Louie presents God creation!
He is very compelling, and packs some "Wow" into his presentations!

Love the passion series.  Bought this for Christmas for my Dad and his wife. My dad has life threatening heart issues and his wife just lost her leg due to an injury that wouldn't heal. They have been so blessed and lifted by this series. I am so thankful I purchased it.
Really good series.  You will find it engaging and revealing.  Strongly recommend.
Great
Makes one realize anew that the breadth, length and depth of our God is truly beyond our comprehension!
Great! Life changing.
I've had several of these and they are so good, I keep giving them away.
Wonderful!
Everyone needs to hear and see the visuals on this series!  Jesus Christ IS the CREATOR and LORD!
Awesome and interesting. Our God is GREAT!

If I could, I would purchase this 4 DVD set for everyone on earth.  Louie G is such an annointed, passionate teacher/preacher.  He moves me to tears every time I listen to him....it's no coincidence that he pastors Passion City Church... his passion is unleashed I these videos.  Do something wonderful for yourself and a friend ...buy a couple of these DVD sets...I'm going to buy more.
Proof that God is huge
As expected

This series is entirely entertaining as well as informative.  It is suitable for all audiences.  The prison inmates we show this series to are always impressed with the message.  Thank you, Mr. Giglio
I keep buying this as a gift for all my friends. Love to learn about science and God.
AWESOME series!
I have shared this with my friends and it is amazing I have watched it over and over again Louie Giglio is precise and allows us to see for ourselves HOW GREAT IS OUR GOD!!!

Product exactly as described. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND these Talk Series videos by Louie Giglio to everybody! AWE INSPIRING, EYE OPENING!!! If you really want to know how Great our God is then these are a MUST SEE!!! Everybody that have seen these in my presence have only GREAT things to say! They all want to see them again! Especially the one entitled "How Great Is Our God".
Absolutely amazing!
Just what I purchased. Well within the delivery dates and it was a good price for a great ministry resource.
The most amazing way to look at Gods great creation.  Louie is an amazing speaker
Very good presentation by Louie Goglio.
Everyone should watch young and old
This video is totally awesome!  If anyone has ever doubted there is a God, I urge them to watch these CDs.  What a wonderful gift to purchase for Home Schoolers or those who are searching for truth!
Wonderful

What a great set of DVDs everyone should watch these the programs will open up their hearts & minds about theGTEAT & glorious God who made this world gave us life & his only son died for our sins so we would live again!!!!
Amazing speaker
Louie is a dynamic speaker who helps us to understand an incomprehensible God. Our whole family has grown from this series.
Love, love, love this collection.
Amazing!!
Great preaching.
FANTASTIC!
Love Louie

This entire collection was fabulous. Because one of the reviewers I read was not real positive, I was a little concerned that I might not be happy with this purchase, but, I believe they were totally wrong. You can view each individually and still get a lot out of it, but my group felt each DVD built on the one before and gave us new insight and perspective.  We thoroughly enjoyed the whole series!

Louie is the best. I give these as graduation gifts to hopefully inspire young kids to remain in church after graduation.
God bless
A great series

Exciting informative ! This is the third time I've bought this, or part of the series, i keep sharing it. I hope to get this one back ,as i have not seen the last two yet. i hear they are great though !!

This is a well-made DVD video series about the wonder of the universe and the God who holds all of it, the heavens--the entire created universe--in the palm of his hand. It contrasts the largeness of God with our smallness, yet shows how each of us is individually known and loved by God. Although by different authors, I thought this was a great sequel to The Star of Bethlehem. Then I bought the single Louie Giglio - Indescribable, which was my introduction to Louie Giglio. Then I bought How Great is Our God. Now I have this with two more talks. With each one, he seems to get better, which is incredible!
Excellent video .... would share with anyone.
Love everything Louie Giglio.  If I had a youth ministry I would definitely show these videos.
Excellent teaching on the greatness of God. This is one of my favorites.
The truth and facts are very enlightening and logical, thus persuasive.
FANTASTIC, engaging, enlightening!
Easy to follow recipes ... good tasting.... quick!
I gifted this set to my church to be used in their periodic Friday night movie series. I am sure all will be well received.

Wonderful video series which truly opens our eyes to the glory of God's creation!  Great to show to a youth group or Sunday School class.  I don't see how anyone could watch this and still believe that this amazing universe just "happened."
perfect
The portion of the DVD that I wanted to see exceeded my expectations.
This is an awesome set of videos. So enlightening.

Love seeing God's universe, what He created by the Word of His mouth so awesome. Symphony brings you into an awesome worship with our Creator, we have experience such worship with Him not worshipping His creation but Him. So Awesome can't say enough for our God how amazing He is. What so crazy is His love for us, we are mere dust. Shalom!

Words like terrific, amazing, and awesome.  What a phenomenal, jaw-dropping DVD set.  I bought 4 and gave 2 as gifts to family members.  Louie is truly gifted and presents a great picture of the majesty  and greatness of the Creator.
Blown away by this DVD.  Everyone should see this
Great!!!!!!

EVERYONE should watch these DVD's! My brother loaned me two of them, and I watched them and sent them back to him. I didn't want to live my  life without watching them again. I ordered my own set. All I can say is that they are WONDERFUL! Bless Louie Giglio for his work!
This series of videos is fantastic and enlightening!

Giglio's well-ordered presentations of truths (planted in science and explained in God's Word to all mankind) are both inspiring and encouraging. Worth watching over and over. He tells the tales of our lives and universe with humor and compassion.

I saw bits and pieces of this video in a Bible study and wanted to see the whole thing, plus my husband wasn't able to make those study weeks and I wanted him to see it, knowing he would love it.  While we haven't had the time to sit down and watch them in full just yet, I already know that they are 5-star!  You have to keep in mind that they are not in HD (if I'm remembering correctly); I know my husband is pretty particular about that.  Even so, you'll be missing out if you don't watch these!!  I read some Louie Giglio and he's incredible; this video series will blow you away.  Don't miss out on his books, either!  Outstanding :)
Excellent.
More than I was hoping for!!!  Louie's messages about God & our savior Jesus Christ are awesome!!!
Got both of them for a Christmas gift!!
This is a very powerful, and inspirational program. This guy is not only inspirational but provides a  very informational message. This disc is for everyone.
Fantastic...amazing

Wow!  This really is an essential collection of Louie Giglio.  Each video is outstanding on it's own or shown as a group.  I have used this for our small group at church and everyone raved about it.  I am using it this year for Community Bible Study leadership training.  After the first one the entire group is quite excited to see the other videos.
Wonderful -  enjoyed immensely
Super fast shipping! Great collection.

The best set for the beginning, middle and end of the Giglio message on the perfect Gospel. Wonderful for pre teen, teen and especially college age folks. Adults in a Sunday school class will walk away with a new perspective as well!
Absolutely love everything Louie Giglio does. Amazing Man of God!
Love these DVD's - very insightful- great gifts
We have shared this CD a lot and some at getting there own CDs!  Powerful!
Loved it . Sent one to in laws and one to grandson who really liked it. Last dvd not so much as other 3 but so worth sharing .
This is a great set of dvds. What he shares is just amazing.

saw these on youtube and decided to buy them because they are so good.

specially for youth group movie nights
Louie Giglio is a very dynamic speaker and the kids really love these presentations.
These videos put me in awe. I can watch them over and over again. Amazing speaker!!!
You have to get it, you will just love it.

Excellent DVD set! Have purchased these more than once and given them out as loaners/gift to many people! A great tool to give someone as you witness (especially "Indescribable" and "How great is our God").
GREAT
great!!!
This series has been very helpful in ministering to our youth group. We would recommend it.

Every time I get another DVD or set of DVDs by Loui Giglio I cannot wait to get the next one. It just gets better and better. God is using this man to open people's eyes to the love and greatness of our God.

Great, great, great set of DVDs. I love having the 4 DVDs in one set, each one of them totally amazing in how indescribable & great God is! I love to share with others also & they tell me how amazing the DVDs are to watch!
Great!
Wonderful!
Amazing videos.  The space pics are incredible and the way they match up with Scripture is just beautiful.  Very uplifting.

I have watched these videos numerous times and each time I find myself singing," Our God Is An Awesome God": the rest of the day! this collection is faith building,educational and very thought provoking. Many thanks to all  who  have invested their time and efforts in creating this series. Great for gifts and as a part of your home library. To God be the Glory.
So uplifting to us!  What a wonderful God we serve---a great reminder of how He is our All , in All.:)

Talk about a dynamic and mind-expanding presentation of the knowledge of our Great Creator - The Essential Collection is that!  I wish I could influence every person to order this series, watch it and pass it on to all within their sphere of influence.  It is powerful.

Friends shared the "How great is our God" video & I had to have the set.
We have shown it to friends & family; young and old--all with a similar response. WOW!
What a speaker and teacher.
Great shared it with my son.

I love the messages of L. G. He's right on with truth. Great DVD's. Thank you.
Very Happy with the product.
Amazing explanation about the greatness of God. After watching this it took me a little while to form a better image of God. I had put Him in a box to fit my own image.
Great video. Showed it to youth group who were spellbound at the enormity of God.
I got these to show during bible study at my church and everyone loved them. They're informative and entertaining.

I use these for fill-ins (if a pastor gets sick) regularly at church or for high school students (in Bible class). I've seen them several times and they still motivate me to love better. Louie is a great communicator and people are always moved when they watch these.
Awesome, Awesome Awesome
We love Louie!  He is fabulous!
Awesome!! Will watch this may times and I've already shared it with family members! Will leave you in AWE
